name: Duck Bow Hunt Free
description:
Duck Bow Hunt is a classic arcade style duck shooting game using a bow and arrows. The goal of the game is to shoot the ducks before they go off the left side of the screen. If you let a duck get away or shoot a crane which are an endangered species you will get an “X” and once you get three the game is over. Touch the screen to shoot an arrow. The closer you touch to the hunter the less powerful the shot.

+ Duck Hunting With A Bow And Arrows
+ Unlimited Arrows
+ Don't Hit The Endangered Crane's
+ Fun For Everyone
